[UK1Host](https://uk1.host) is London based web hosting provider. We are a fast growing provider of pure SSD shared hosting, VPS and more. Our services are backed by a 99.9% uptime and 2 hour ticket response SLA. We offer a 14 day money back guarantee for most services.

While low end is not our target market, we do have an offer that falls below the LET limit:
